title: AMS Performance logo
content:
[www.amsperformance.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109173904/http:/www.amsperformance.com/ "www.amsperformance.com")

just was wondering what font would be close to this or what it is...  
not really familiar with fonts as im a new graphic design student just trying to re-create a promotional poster for them

thanks!  
-Sean
author: seansurfn2

comments.content:
You mean just the _AMS_ bit? Because there's loads of fonts on there -- Bank Gothic, ITC Kabel, Franklin Gothic, Perpetua, Arial...

The AMS bit looks either custom drawn or a poor quality freeware font.
